scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean   && browserify src/index.js --standalone Main -o static/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify
scripts.start: watchify src/index.js --standalone Main -o static/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify -v
